mapper.select: SELECT PLAN_CODE AS planCode, PLAN_ORDER AS planOrder, USER_ID AS userId, PLACE_NAME AS placeName, PLACE_ADDRESS AS placeAddress, PHONE, CATEGORY, LAT, LNG, LINK_URL AS linkUrl, USER_MEMO AS userMemo FROM TB_TRAVEL_PLAN WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY planOrder asc
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_TRAVEL_PLAN SET USER_ID = #{userId}, PLACE_NAME = #{placeName}, PLACE_ADDRESS = #{placeAddress}, PHONE = #{phone}, CATEGORY = #{category}, LAT = #{lat}, LNG = #{lng}, LINK_URL = #{linkUrl} WHERE PLAN_CODE = #{planCode} AND PLAN_ORDER = #{planOrder}
